experiences.name: Infinite Computer Solution Pvt. Ltd.
experiences.short: Worked at Philips India, a consumer lifestyle department in company. My work here is to bring up the Qualcomm Snapdragon platform at the application layer, creating a base for camera-client communication, the client SDK and camera FDK, a base for vision problems, streaming, and fast image operations such as false coloring and video stabilization.
